staxel.village.character.dialogue.MaxFri: (안함)Putting up flyers, knowing that a grand event is looming!
(안함)It really brings some liveliness to the town!
(안함)It's far too much work! It may be worth the reward, but it's certainly not easy...
(안함)There is nothing quite like being able to plan for the town's future.
(안함)Knowing that the buildings will stand long after you're gone.
(안함)Leaving a grand legacy of sorts for the people who will come after.
